koohiiStory1: This child has taken filial piety to the next level. He is actually carrying the old man on his shoulders.
koohiiStory2: +dilandau23: This child has taken filial piety to the next level. He is actually carrying the old man on his shoulders. There is a picture of a statue depicting this here http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Filial_piety.
words: 孝行(こうこう): filial piety
